Title: Provides for the presence of either a uniformed court officer or law enforcement officer during court proceedings
Summary: Provides for the chief administrator of the courts to, upon request by a municipality, ensure the assignment and presence of a uniformed court officer during court proceedings or a law enforcement officer where no uniformed court officer is available.
LawCode: Amd §109, UJCA; amd §§216, 849-h, 849-i & 219-b, Judy L; amd §2.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform justice court act, the judiciary law, and the criminal procedure law, in relation to providing for the presence of either a uniformed court officer or law enforcement officer during court proceedings
